trends: There have been 36 other sightings in Henderson
There were no other sightings in Henderson on or around September 15th 1987
Summary: I looked up and saw a circle above my house one moment, the next it was gone.
divs: Sighting DetailsI walked out to my car to go to work, it was probably about 7:30 or 8:00am; the sky was blue and very clear. As I walked through the yard to get to my car parked in the street, I glanced up in the sky above me and saw a round object sitting perfectly still very high above. I remember the object having a shiny silver color and I also remember seeing detail underneath. From my perspective it appeared to be the size of a nickel or a quarter, but very high. The object disappeared almost immediately, it did not fly away, it just vanished; it almost looked like "oops, he saw us." I did a double take while I continued to the car, the object was not there. I got in, drove to work and continued my day like nothing had happened. I can't remember very much because this happened so long ago. What's bothering me is the fact that I suppressed the memory. I don't know why so many years later the memory has returned and it is stuck in my head as though it happened yesterday. I remember around that time having an abduction type nightmare. I accepted the dream that night as having been a bad dream and nothing more, and the memories of that nightmare never left me so I'm not as bothered by the nightmare as I am by the silver circle in the sky. The object above the house was real and my recent memory of it has me wondering if I'm going nuts (lol). I have recently been reading up on UFO stories and trying to find similar stories on-line. I read where people have gone to psychiatrist and the therapist have brought up suppressed memories. I have also heard reports on talk shows and news reports of therapist bringing up suppressed memories of abuse cases. I have not been to a therapist and have not discussed my recent recollection with anybody whatsoever. This is the first time I am talking about it and it is only because I stubled across a site that asked me to tell the story.
